channel.title: I NEED A CODER!
channel.description: hey guys i need an experienced coder to help with me server my MSN is jamesszabo@netzero.com add me please i need an experienced coder as fast as possible thanks!! if you turn out to be what we need you get 50% of all donations and you get admin!!! so add me on msn!!! or pm me on here ASAP!!

item.title: I NEED A CODER!
item.dc:creator: @vampire1405 vampire1405
item.description:
@vampire1405 wrote:

Greetings,

My name is Jax Dervish, and i own a small organization call Omen Robot Entertainment. I am affiliated with DynastyScape, and have much experience coding servers. By the looks of this post, somebody’s probably going to flame me here anyway, lol, so contact me at my email, knowitall1405@gmail.com. If you are interested in working with me, you may also ask there.

Cheers, Moderators. I sincerely hope your job gets easier one day : ). I’m one myself at Liamigo Online Entertainment, so i know how it goes, lol.

Best Regards,

Jax Dervish

Read full topic

lol i can code but i cant get classic to run… i add commands and stuff like npcs… new items… well anyway lol
[/quote]Editing xml values in a .xml file isn’t coding, also, how are you able to code when you can’t get the server to run? It’s pointless calling xml value editing coding and doing xml value editing when you can’t even get a server running.[/quote]
IMO, I think he just threw that shit out there.
